requirement_tested: Stock search functionality by code or name
user_persona: A financial analyst who needs quick access to stock data.
user_goal: To find information about a specific stock by entering its symbol.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Symbol
narrative_steps.description: Maya visits the homepage and sees the centered search bar. She types in 'AAPL' to look up Apple Inc.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'AAPL' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The input is accepted and the search icon becomes active.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Search
narrative_steps.description: Maya presses Enter to start her search for the stock.
narrative_steps.action: Press the Enter key.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Matching stock results appear below the search bar, showing Apple Inc. as the top result.

user_persona: A novice investor exploring stock performance.
user_goal: To quickly understand key metrics of a selected stock.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Stock
narrative_steps.description: After searching, Raj clicks on the result for Tesla to view its summary card.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the Tesla stock result from the search list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A summary card appears displaying Tesla's current price, daily change, market cap, P/E ratio, and dividend yield with accompanying icons.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Metrics
narrative_steps.description: Raj notices the P/E ratio and wants to know what it means, so he clicks on the metric icon.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the P/E ratio metric icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip pops up explaining that P/E ratio measures the company's current share price relative to its per-share earnings.

user_persona: An investment manager preparing client presentations.
user_goal: To generate a tailored report containing specific sections.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Report Template
narrative_steps.description: Priya scrolls down to the 'Generate Report' section and selects the 'Annual Review' template.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Annual Review' template button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system begins generating the report based on Priya's selected stock and chosen template, displaying it in the preview pane.

user_persona: A researcher needing to archive reports in different formats.
user_goal: To download the same report in multiple file formats for distribution.

narrative_steps.title: Changing Format
narrative_steps.description: David has generated his report and wants to save it as a Word document instead of PDF.
narrative_steps.action: Open the 'Format' dropdown and select 'Word (.docx)'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The selected format updates, and the 'Download' button label changes to reflect the new format choice.

user_persona: A portfolio strategist focusing on financial health analysis.
user_goal: To exclude irrelevant sections and focus only on financial data in the report.

narrative_steps.title: Deselecting Sections
narrative_steps.description: Maria wants a leaner report, so she unchecks 'Market Trends' and 'Analyst Opinions' under content customization.
narrative_steps.action: Click the checkboxes for 'Market Trends' and 'Analyst Opinions' to deselect them.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Those sections are removed from the preview and will not appear in the final generated report.

user_persona: A student learning about publicly traded companies.
user_goal: To gather general information about a company for academic research.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Company Details
narrative_steps.description: Sofia selects Microsoft and views its basic info panel to learn more about the business.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the basic information section of the Microsoft stock page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displays Microsoft's symbol, full company name, sector, industry, market cap, and website URL with a placeholder logo if none exists.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Official Site
narrative_steps.description: Curious about the company's products, Sofia clicks on the website link.
narrative_steps.action: Click the website URL link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Microsoft’s official website opens in a new browser tab.

user_persona: A day trader tracking intraday price movements.
user_goal: To analyze short-term volatility using interactive charts.

narrative_steps.title: Switching Time Frames
narrative_steps.description: Jake wants to see how Amazon performed over the past month and clicks the corresponding time frame button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the '1M' duration button above the chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart updates to show Amazon’s price movement over the last month.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Data Points
narrative_steps.description: Jake hovers over a peak in the line graph to get precise pricing details.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a point on the chart line.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears showing the exact date and price at that moment.

user_persona: An equity analyst performing deep financial due diligence.
user_goal: To compare quarterly revenues across years.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Financial Tables
narrative_steps.description: Elena navigates to the financial data tab where she finds quarterly income statements for Coca-Cola.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Financial Data' tab and locate the revenue row.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A table shows Coca-Cola's quarterly revenues across several years in descending chronological order.

narrative_steps.title: Sorting by Revenue
narrative_steps.description: She wants to sort the data by highest revenue first.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Revenue' column header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The table reorders itself with the highest quarterly revenues appearing at the top.

user_persona: A UX designer evaluating interface consistency.
user_goal: To verify that all pages maintain a uniform white background.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Pages
narrative_steps.description: Tom browses through various sections including Home, Search, Reports, and Settings.
narrative_steps.action: Visit each main navigation section of the site.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each page maintains a solid white background throughout the interface.

user_persona: A brand compliance officer auditing visual identity standards.
user_goal: To confirm that all interactive elements use the correct navy color.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting UI Components
narrative_steps.description: Lisa checks buttons, links, and input borders across different modules.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the color of buttons, links, and input fields visually or via inspection tools.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All specified UI components consistently use navy blue (#000080).

narrative_steps.title: Testing Hover States
narrative_steps.description: She hovers over a few buttons to ensure hover effects match branding guidelines.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over multiple navy-colored buttons.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Buttons slightly lighten in color upon hover, maintaining accessibility contrast ratios.

requirement_tested: User input validation for stock identifiers
user_persona: A casual user unfamiliar with proper stock ticker formats.
user_goal: To receive helpful feedback when making mistakes during searches.

narrative_steps.title: Typing Invalid Input
narrative_steps.description: Kevin accidentally types '!!invalid$$' into the search bar and hits enter.
narrative_steps.action: Enter invalid characters into the search field and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An error message 'Invalid stock identifier' appears beneath the search bar without initiating a search.

user_persona: A compliance officer archiving generated reports.
user_goal: To securely download finalized reports for record-keeping purposes.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading Final Report
narrative_steps.description: Amber finishes customizing her report and clicks the Download button to save it locally.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Download Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The browser initiates a download of the fully generated report in the previously selected format.

user_persona: A trader monitoring live market fluctuations.
user_goal: To stay informed of minute-by-minute price changes without manual refresh.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Auto Updates
narrative_steps.description: Carlos watches the stock summary for Netflix and waits to see if prices update automatically.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for approximately one minute while observing the summary panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The timestamp updates to 'Just now' and numerical values refresh silently with subtle animations.

user_persona: An editor proofreading a client-facing stock report.
user_goal: To review and make quick adjustments before exporting.

narrative_steps.title: Scrolling Through Preview
narrative_steps.description: Megan scrolls through the full-length preview of her customized Google stock report.
narrative_steps.action: Use the scrollbar to navigate vertically through the report preview.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The entire report renders smoothly in the preview window, allowing full visibility of all selected sections.

user_persona: A mobile user accessing stock tools remotely.
user_goal: To easily navigate features regardless of device screen size.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing Browser Window
narrative_steps.description: Felix resizes his browser window to simulate viewing on a tablet.
narrative_steps.action: Gradually resize the browser window to smaller dimensions.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts responsively; content reflows appropriately and navigation collapses into a hamburger menu.

narrative_steps.title: Using Mobile Navigation
narrative_steps.description: He taps the collapsed menu icon to access other sections.
narrative_steps.action: Click the hamburger menu icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigation menu expands vertically with clearly labeled items like Home, Search, Reports, and Settings.
